mapper.select: select course.id, course_name, coach.id, coach_name from course, coach, coach_course where course.id = coach_course.id_course and coach_course.id_coach = coach.id

select course.id, course_name, coach.id, coach_name from course, coach_course, coach where course.id = coach_course.id and coach_course.id = coach.id and (coach.id LIKE ('%', #{coachKey}, '%') or coach_name LIKE ('%', #{coachKey}, '%'))

select course.id, course_name, coach.id, coach_name from course, coach_course, coach where course.id = coach_course.id and coach_course.id = coach.id and (course.id LIKE ('%', #{courseKey}, '%') or course_name LIKE ('%', #{courseKey}, '%'))
